name: COCONUTT SHELL!!!
description:
Set forth on an adventure Coconut Shell! You must save the sea from the evil Trump and his army of Nazi cats. Control coconut shell in a 2d pixel art adventure where you swim to avoid dangerous perils and to save friendly fish from Trumps scheme to resurrect an ancient demon and much more silly antics.

Coconut can be controlled with keyboard or game controllers. Hope you enjoy and thanks for any support.
